title: Checkmate
description: Dylan survived the traumatic events that transpired on the grounds of Halder Academy. Now it’s Winter break, and it’s time for her to travel home with the Halder brothers. She’s been coddled during her recovery, but all she wants is to become closer with Seb, Connor, and Gray. Sparks, hotter than ever, fly between Dylan and her men. But before she can prove she’s ready to take things to the next level, a murder occurs.The local police instantly point fingers at one of the brothers. Dylan is eager to help, but secrets are being kept from her. The last thing she wants in her life is more secrets. What could her Halder brothers possibly have to hide?This is a reverse harem novel. Book 2 of 3 in The Halder Brothers series. 18+ for language and sexual content, content warnings available on the author’s website.
author: Emily Kinsman
